name: inSynch
description: An art-music-arcade game, inSynch is handcrafted and animated in stop motion. The game jumps and hops between meditative compositions and devilishly hard time-attack challenges!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5GHz Memory: 666 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes: We also require headphones

reviews.review_text: Highly addictive, hectic andfun, inSynch is the puzzle game that masquerades as a rhythm game. You hit four keys to bump four different blocks into a pit to make the level's song grow and transform into the full song, and that's about it!  Timing is absolutely key.
